com.umeng.common.ui.dialogs

类 PickerDialog<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Dialog
      • com.umeng.common.ui.dialogs.PickerDialog<E>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.DialogInterface, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    直接已知子类:
    AtFriendDialog, LocationPickerDlg, SelectTopicDialog

    public abstract class PickerDialog<E>
extends android.app.Dialog
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    发帖时的@好友和位置选择Dialog的基类
